com.jnape.palatable.lambda.optics.prisms

Class MapPrism

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jnape.palatable.lambda.optics.prisms.MapPrism

  • public final class MapPrism
extends Object
    Prisms for Maps.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <M extends Map<K,V>,K,V>
      Prism<Map<K,V>,M,V,V>      		 valueAt(Fn1<Map<K,V>,M> copyFn, K k)
      A Prism that focuses on the value at a key in a Map, and produces an instance of M on the way back out.
      static <K,V> Prism.Simple<Map<K,V>,V> valueAt(K k)
      A Prism that focuses on the value at a key in a Map making no guarantees about the Map interface.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

                                                                     K k)
        A Prism that focuses on the value at a key in a Map, and produces an instance of M on the way back out.
        Type Parameters:
        M - the Map subtype
        K - the key type
        V - the value type
        Parameters:
        copyFn - the copy function
        k - the key to focus on
